---
title: "Unlock Labs Feature Announcement: Expanded Layout Options for Events"
subtitle: ""
authorName: "Unlock Protocol"
publishDate: "Mon Aug 19 2024 14:34:23 GMT+0000 (Coordinated Universal Time)"
description: "Multiple layouts now available on desktop and mobile event pages."
image: "/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--expanded-layout-options-for-events/3cdb2e73020e7abb793eae054e4a5de1.jpg"
---

![Unlock Labs Feature Announcement: Expanded Layout Options for Events](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/3cdb2e73020e7abb793eae054e4a5de1.jpg)

<p>Event organizers using EVENTS by Unlock Labs can now choose between the classic "banner" layout option for their event landing pages, or a new "bannerless" layout that puts the event's onchain ticket image in a much more prominent position.</p><p><strong>Default "Banner" layout</strong></p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--expanded-layout-options-for-events/a4c1eadc6b0d755d17c468ab9a199ee6.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1680" nextwidth="2542" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p><strong>New "Bannerless" layout option</strong></p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--expanded-layout-options-for-events/0cb73721513946e38f4f053e3ec0f54e.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1581" nextwidth="2554" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p></p><p>Event organizers can toggle between these two options from the settings area in their event admin dashboard.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/unlock-labs-feature-announcement--expanded-layout-options-for-events/7f6f639ce6de7c7c3922f95d37410d50.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="1734" nextwidth="2086" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p></p>
